column1: The Pit Room////So why not 5 stars?? Well
column2: the prices aren't exactly "great" - although they are reasonable. I am of the belief that a lunch counter style BBQ place could trim a little bit more of the fat (har har) price wise considering the business model. But that's not my main beef (har har again)...a couple times when I've been here
column3: hosting out of town guests the flies and/or gnats in the dining area have been extremely annoying. This is not only unsanitary but it also isn't a good look to be telling someone how great a place is only to not be able to enjoy our meal because we're having to swat at flying insects while trying to eat. One of these two things (price/gnats) I mentioned would be forgivable
column5: combined they result in the loss of a star.
